definition: A formal agreement or understanding between two or more parties, typically involving the organization or coordination of something. It is commonly used to refer to a planned or agreed-upon order or configuration of elements, often in the context of music, events, or artistic compositions.

examples.german: Das Arrangement des Zimmers gefällt mir.
examples.english: I like the arrangement of the room.

examples.german: Wir haben ein Arrangement für das Wochenende.
examples.english: We have an arrangement for the weekend.

examples.german: Das Arrangement der Blumen ist wunderschön.
examples.english: The arrangement of the flowers is beautiful.

examples.german: Sie hat ein Arrangement mit dem Veranstalter getroffen.
examples.english: She made an arrangement with the organizer.

examples.german: Das Arrangement des Liedes ist sehr originell.
examples.english: The arrangement of the song is very original.
